remarks: Membership in the set of left-regular elements.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Mar-2015.)
statement:
rrgval.e $e |- E = ( RLReg ` R ) $.
rrgval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
rrgval.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
rrgval.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
isrrg $p |- ( X e. E <-> ( X e. B /\ A. y e. B ( ( X .x. y ) = .0. -> y = .0. ) ) ) $.
$d B y $.
$d R y $.
$d X y $.
